vogar.tasks

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.tasks.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildActionTask, DexTask, ExtractJarResourceTask, InstallApkTask, MkdirTask, PrepareTarget, PrepareUserDirTask, RetrieveFilesTask, RmTask, RunActionTask, UninstallApkTask

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    A task necessary to accomplish the user's requested actions. Tasks have prerequisites; a task must not be run until it reports that it is runnable. Tasks may be run at most once; running a task produces a result.

      • isAction

        public boolean isAction()
        Returns true if this task is an action task. The queue imposes limits on how many actions may be run concurrently.
